attributes.description: 4WD GPS NAVIGATION ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS CONDITION. One owner since new. Full service history, every service completed on schedule and up to date, including service recently completed, WHICH EQUALS 100 PERCENT PEACE OF MIND. Titanium silver metallic with black leather upholstery in excellent condition and finished with satin silver trim. Loaded with all standard extras and additional extras including Multifunctional leather steering wheel, Touch screen infotainment with GPS Navigation, Bluetooth connectivity, Electric windows, Park distance control, Full leather package, Auto Armor safety smash and grab tinted windows, etc. etc. 4 GENERAL GRABBER TYRES LIKE NEW. THIS HAS TO BE THE BEST VALUED DUSTER DIESEL 4X4 DYNAMIQUE AVAILABLE ANYWHERE IN SA Must be seen to be appreciated.
